author: Olivia Kelly
title: Almost 40,00 employers sign up to wage subsidy scheme
description: Free delivery of newspapers for vulnerable people by An Post begins
content:
Almost 40,000 employers have registered for the Covid-19 wage subsidy scheme since it was established two weeks ago, the Government has confirmed.
Assistant secretary general in the Department of the Taoiseach Liz Canavan commended the strong uptake of the s… [+2859 chars]
